name: pnp-list-formatting-emoji-link-tile-format
title: Link collection using Emoji
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates a link collection using Emoji and is a customization of the `Gallery` layout. Additionally, this sample combines group customization with a tile format.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates a link collection using Emoji and is a customization of the `Gallery` layout. Additionally, this sample combines group customization with a tile format.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
